content: Activate the Deer Sight Forest Keeper's Shrine and go toward the lightning and red tree in the middle of the clearing. Underneath the tree sits the Cloudtreading Deer.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Foothills_Walkthrough.md", within the section "Foothills Walkthrough" and the sub-section "Deer Sight Forest". The content is presented below:

Activate the Deer Sight Forest Keeper's Shrine and go toward the lightning and red tree in the middle of the clearing. Underneath the tree sits the Cloudtreading Deer.
